name: Veri-Tax
overview:
Veri-Tax is the premiere provider of verification and fraud management solutions for the mortgage lending and consumer credit industries. As the pioneer of electronic income tax verification, Veri-Tax simplifies the lending transaction while providing an unparalleled level of transaction security and fraud prevention.

Founded in 1998, Veri-tax was established with the belief that advances in information technology could be utilized to stream-line the retrieval of IRS forms and documents needed to verify borrower loan application information.
